Class TooltipOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class TooltipOptions
extends Options
    Options for tooltips.

    • Field Detail

      • backgroundColor

        @Option
public String backgroundColor
        Background color of the tooltip.

        Default: "rgba(0,0,0,0.8)"

      • bodyFontColor

        @Option
public String bodyFontColor
        The body font color.

        Default: "#FFF"

      • bodyFontFamily

        @Option
public String bodyFontFamily
        The body font family.

        Default: "Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif"

      • bodyFontSize

        @Option
public Integer bodyFontSize
        The bodu font size.

        Default: 12

      • bodyFontStyle

        @Option
public String bodyFontStyle
        The body font style.

        Default: "normal"

      • bodySpacing

        @Option
public Integer bodySpacing
        The spacing to add to top and bottom of each tooltip item.

        Default: 2

      • borderColor

        @Option
public String borderColor
        Color of the border.

        Default: "rgba(0,0,0,0)"

      • borderWidth

        @Option
public Integer borderWidth
        Size of the border.

        Default: 0

      • callbacks

        @Option
public final TooltipCallbackOptions callbacks
        Options for tooltip callbacks.

      • caretPadding

        @Option
public Integer caretPadding
        Extra distance to move the end of the tooltip arrow away from the tooltip point.

        Default: 2

      • caretSize

        @Option
public Integer caretSize
        Size, in px, of the tooltip arrow.

        Default: 5

      • cornerRadius

        @Option
public Double cornerRadius
        Radius of tooltip corner curves.

        Default: 6

      • custom

        @Option(convertTo=JavaScript.class)
public String custom
        Custom tooltip function/

      • displayColors

        @Option
public Boolean displayColors
        If true, color boxes are shown in the tooltip.

        Default: true

      • enabled

        @Option
public Boolean enabled
        If true, on-canvas tooltips are enabled.

        Default: true

      • filter

        @Option(convertTo=JavaScript.class)
public String filter
        Custom function for filtering tooltip items.

public Integer footerFontSize
        The footer font size.

        Default: 12

      • footerFontStyle

        @Option
public String footerFontStyle
        The footer font style.

        Default: "bold"

      • footerMarginTop

        @Option
public Integer footerMarginTop
        Margin to add before drawing the footer.

        Default: 6

      • footerSpacing

        @Option
public Integer footerSpacing
        The spacing to add to top and bottom of each footer line.

        Default: 2

      • intersect

        @Option
public Boolean intersect
        If true, the tooltip mode applies only when the mouse position intersects with an element. If false, the mode will be applied at all times.

        Default: true

      • itemSort

        @Option(convertTo=JavaScript.class)
public String itemSort
        Custom function for sorting tooltip items.

      • mode

        @Option
public HoverModeEnum mode
        Determines which elements appear in the tooltip.

        Default: NEAREST

      • multiKeyBackground

        @Option
public String multiKeyBackground
        Color to draw behind the colored boxes when multiple items are in the tooltip.

        Default: "#FFF"

      • position

        @Option
public TooltipOptions.PositionModeEnum position
        The mode for positioning the tooltip.

        Default: AVERAGE

        @Option
public String titleFontColor
        The title font color.

        Default: "#FFF"

        Default: 2

public Integer xPadding
        Padding to add on left and right of tooltip.

        Default: 6
